transcript:
Customer: Kitni jaldi.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Update nahi kiya tha kya?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan ji HR services se baat ho rahi hai meri.
Customer: Haan haan boliye.
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Haan ji haan, main actually ek zaruri baat karni thi aapse main business manager baat kar raha hun Vivek Mishra from IndiaMART.
Executive: Madam aapne ek concern raise kiya hua tha usi ke regarding call kiya hai maine aapko.
Customer: Haan ji sir, thoda increase karwaiyega data wagera calling nahi aa raha.
Executive: Kya keh rahi hai aap?
Customer: Bol rahi hun data wagera increase karwaiye.
Executive: Kaun sa data madam?
Customer: Jo leads buyers ke aate hain na buyers ke through.
Executive: Kaun sa data madam jo buyleads hai aap unki baat kar rahi hai madam?
Customer: Ji ji wahi wahi.
Executive: Madam actually ye jo aapka jo services chal raha hai na ye TrustSeal ka chal raha hai right? Isme aapko milta hai madam 34 buyleads right? Aur isme aapko 34 se zyada buyleads nahi mil sakti hain. Ek aur option hai agar aap apni services ko upgrade karati hai na madam to aapka jo number of buyleads hai wo badh jayega.
Customer: Achha, theek hai main bolti hun sir ko phir karwane ke liye.
Executive: To aap madam aap hi handle karti hai services ya koi aur karta hai aapke alawa?
Customer: Nahi nahi koi aur karta hai.
Executive: Achha to aapse ji sir karte hain. Hmm hmm. Aapne I think IndiaMART ka jo customer care hai mein call kiya tha ya sorry mail kiya tha aapne.
Customer: Haan ji right.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Aapka ek conflict bhi chal raha hai madam ek buyer ke sath wo aapne solve kar liya hai?
Customer: Haan madam se meri baat hui thi to madam ne bola tha wo sort out kar di.
Executive: Achha usko aap sort out kar lijiye madam aur sath mein ek cheez aur batata hun main aapko.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Ye aapka sabse main product mein ye hai kya NTI iron gel?
Customer: Haan ji sir wahi hai.
Executive: Sabse main hai na ye?
Customer: Main hai yes sir.
Executive: Abhi kyunki main dekh raha hun madam isme na aapka sabse achchi cheez ye hai ki isme overall IndiaMART pe agar main number of buyleads ki baat karun na to bahut achcha flow hai isme. Aur aapne bataya bhi ki ye aapka one of the main product hai aapka khud ka koi website wagera bhi aap log run kar rahe hain kya madam?
Customer: Website uska to mujhe idea nahi hai wo sir hi bata payenge. To ek kaam kijiye na main aapko sir ka number ya to phir main sir ko bol deti hun aapke number pe call kar lenge wo.
Executive: Nahi main khud connect kar lunga aapka ye kaun sa number hai ye I think 258 hai end mein jispe baat ho rahi hai abhi.
Customer: Haan haan meri yahi wala number register hai. Haan aur ek aur number hai jiske end mein 525 hai wo kiska hai?
Customer: 525. Haan ek wo bhi company ka hi number hai. Company madam ka hi number hai.
Executive: Madam ka hi number hai? To Haan ji main ye bol rahi hun na sir mera hi number wahan pe register kiya hua hai main ek kaam karti hun ghar jaake phir main aapka jo number hai wo sir ko de deti hun to jo bhi baat hai wo aap log kar lenge theek hai na?
Executive: Hmm hmm to aapka aap mujhe na ek sir ka number bhi provide kar dijiye. Taki main bhi yahan se kyunki haan kyunki aapko time ho gaya hai main kal unse connect kar lunga ek baar bataiye number. Achcha theek hai sir main ek kaam karti hun kal morning mein number de deti hun office time aake to phir aap baat kar lijiyega.
Executive: Kal morning mein? Haan ji. Agar madam aap abhi de deti to main unse connect kar leta ek baar. Achcha to thoda wait kijiye na sir. Main sir ko bolti hun pehle sir se baat kar leti hun phir main deti hun aapko. Achcha aap pehle unse permission lengi. Haan ji permission ki baat hai. Haan ji. Aapne madam aapki company ki taraf se ho sakta hai aapne ya sir ne ek mail kiya hua tha. Haan sir ne kiya hoga. Haan to uske regarding bhi mujhe baat karna tha unse. Achcha theek hai main ek kaam karti hun. Unhone achcha unhone bola tha ki main apne account manager se connect karna chahta hun. Unhone ye dala hua hai. Achcha to haan aur actually mere khayal se na aapka number yahan par registered hai to humne jab bhi connect kiya hai aapko kiya hai. Haan humne jab bhi connect kiya hai na aapko hi kiya hai to agar mil jata na number sir ka to main unse phir directly baat kar leta kyunki unhone concern yahi raise kiya hai. Haan ji main wahi bol rahi hun ki main de deti hun number theek hai na wait kijiye thoda sa. Haan to aapke call back karengi madam ya main karun aapko call? Main deti hun sir aapko kal morning mein ab ghar jati hun kyunki actually mujhe khud problem ho rahi hai. Achcha achcha theek hai koi dikkat nahi hai koi dikkat nahi hai. Kal morning mein 11 baje ke aas pass connect karte hain aap number. Haan haan bilkul bilkul sir. Bilkul sir theek hai sir. Theek hai. Le lo. Ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to increase buyleads.

- Customer had conflict with a buyer.

- Executive wants to connect with the customer's boss.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about TrustSeal services.

- Executive informed about upgrading services to increase buyleads.

- Executive asked customer to sort out conflict with buyer.

- Executive asked about website and main product.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will provide her boss's number tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, upgrade, conflict, website
